title: Election Tampering - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/10/18
itunes:title: Election Tampering - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/10/18
description:
George Noory and election security expert Jonathan Simon examine ways that American electronic voting systems are under threat of hacking and tampering by foreign governments, as well as ways they can be protected.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
